channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Subscribers Text Counter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Subscribers Text Counter

item.title: CVE-2023-3356|2023-08-30T14:21:59.863Z -- unknown -- subscribers%20text%20counter
item.description: The Subscribers Text Counter WordPress plugin before 1.7.1 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack, which also lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping
